title: How to Ice a Christmas Cake (Marzipan)

steps.headline: Bake the cake in advance.
steps.description: Have it already prepared on the wire rack and baking tray.

steps.headline: Lay the marzipan.
steps.description: Unroll the marzipan, removing its protective covering. Lay the circle of marzipan over the cake.

steps.headline: Squeeze the marzipan around the edges.
steps.description: Use your fingers and whole hand, gently pressing down, so that it fits firmly over the cake. Cut off any excess marzipan to tidy it up.

steps.headline: Make the icing sugar.
steps.description: Into the large bowl add the icing sugar and a dash of water and begin to mix it in. Gradually add the rest of the water, while stirring constantly, until it forms a thick, smooth paste.

steps.headline: Ice the cake.
steps.description: Using the spatula, spoon a dollop of icing sugar on the cake and spread it over evenly. Spoon on a little more and spread it over around the sides. Continue spreading until the entire cake has been covered. Smooth over and around the fringe of the cake as a final finish. Make sure it looks neat.

steps.headline: Once iced, place the cake into the fridge for half an hour to chill and set.
Present and serve.
steps.description: The cake is now ready to serve. If wished, you can decorate with some Christmas goodies for that extra festive feel! Merry Christmas!

text: Bake the cake in advance. Have it already prepared on the wire rack and baking tray. Lay the marzipan. Unroll the marzipan, removing its protective covering. Lay the circle of marzipan over the cake. Squeeze the marzipan around the edges. Use your fingers and whole hand, gently pressing down, so that it fits firmly over the cake. Cut off any excess marzipan to tidy it up. Make the icing sugar. Into the large bowl add the icing sugar and a dash of water and begin to mix it in. Gradually add the rest of the water, while stirring constantly, until it forms a thick, smooth paste. Ice the cake. Using the spatula, spoon a dollop of icing sugar on the cake and spread it over evenly. Spoon on a little more and spread it over around the sides. Continue spreading until the entire cake has been covered. Smooth over and around the fringe of the cake as a final finish. Make sure it looks neat. Once iced, place the cake into the fridge for half an hour to chill and set.  Present and serve. The cake is now ready to serve. If wished, you can decorate with some Christmas goodies for that extra festive feel! Merry Christmas!
